item.title: BBD
item.description: score:72 Chances: Brazil’s hugely popular Pix payment system is becoming the country’s favorite way to pay, threatening the dominance of credit cards in e-commerce. Banco Bradesco SA recently announced a dividend of $0 per share, payable on 2024-05-09, with the ex-dividend date set for 2024-04-02.
